Tooltip_IndustricaItemPump:
Utility that can pull items from its input container and push them into its output container.
Consumes 1 power on pump if an item was able to be pumped, and will not pump if there is not enough power.
Multiple pumps connected in series multiplies effective throughput.
Will not pull that which it cannot insert into the output container.
Tooltip_IndustricaElectricOperator: Utility that continuously consumes a small amount of power to operate on the information trasmitted through the two input wires with one of a few mathematical and bitwise operations.
Tooltip_IndustricaElectricLever: Utility that continuously consumes a small amount of power to output 1 into the connected wire if it is toggled, or 0 otherwise. If the base runs out of power, it will be automatically toggled off, and will require manual intervention to turn back on.
Tooltip_IndustricaElectricSplitter:
Utility that continuously consumes a small amount of power to split incoming wire information in two halves.
If the input is an odd number, the additional remainder comes through the second output.
Tooltip_IndustricaElectricTimer: Utility that continuously consumes a moderate amount of power to delay incoming wire information. Delay is determined by the bottom wire input - that is the number of seconds, but the utility has an additional hardcoded delay itself.
Tooltip_IndustricaFilterLocker: Locker with little storage with filtering capability. When an item is attempted to be inserted, consumes 1 power to determine if it should be allowed. The filtration system will not function without enough power.
Tooltip_IndustricaItemTechTypeFilterWrit: Analyses and imprints item type data from the template item (right slot) to the filter (left slot), using a lot of power over a period of time. A filter cannot be a template item. Imprinting process will begin automatically once both slots are filled and destroys the target item. If the base runs out of power while it's processing, the target item will be lost.
IndustricaWriterItemTechTypeFilter_Error: Cannot deconstruct imprinter with items in it
